payment_of_terms.description: The payment terms and conditions specified in the contract, including timing and methodology.

enumDescriptions.Standard_0_0_30: Standard payment terms with net 30 days payment period.
enumDescriptions.Non_Standard: Non-standard payment terms that deviate from typical industry practices.
enumDescriptions.Project_PO_Specific: Payment terms that are specific to the project or purchase order requirements.

subcontractor_flow_down_terms.description: Whether contract terms flow down to subcontractors and how they are handled.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Contract terms explicitly flow down to subcontractors.
enumDescriptions.No: Contract terms do not flow down to subcontractors.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Subcontractor flow-down terms are not addressed in the contract.

limitation_of_liability.description: Provisions that limit the liability exposure of parties in the contract.

enumDescriptions.Standard: Standard limitation of liability clauses as per company policy.
enumDescriptions.Negotiated_Terms: Customized limitation of liability terms negotiated for this specific contract.

product_discounts.description: Whether product discounts are applicable or included in the contract pricing.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Product discounts are included or applicable in this contract.
enumDescriptions.No: No product discounts are included or applicable in this contract.

customer_name.description: The legal name of the customer or client organization entering into the contract.

lien_waiver.description: Provisions regarding lien waiver rights and requirements in the contract.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Lien waiver provisions are included and required.
enumDescriptions.No: Lien waiver provisions are explicitly excluded.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Lien waiver provisions are not addressed in the contract terms.

liquidated_damages.description: Predetermined damage amounts for specific breaches or delays as specified in the contract.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Liquidated damages clauses are included with standard terms.
enumDescriptions.Project_PO_Specific: Liquidated damages are specific to this project or purchase order.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Liquidated damages provisions are not included in the contract.

warranty.description: Warranty terms and coverage provided for products or services under the contract.

enumDescriptions.Standard: Standard warranty terms as per company policy.
enumDescriptions.Negotiated_Terms: Customized warranty terms negotiated for this specific contract.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Warranty provisions are not included in the contract terms.

indemnification.description: Indemnification clauses that define liability protection between contracting parties.

enumDescriptions.Standard: Standard indemnification clauses as per company policy.
enumDescriptions.Negotiated_Terms: Customized indemnification terms negotiated for this specific contract.

intellectual_properties.description: Intellectual property rights, ownership, and usage terms specified in the contract.

enumDescriptions.SEL_Standard: Standard SEL intellectual property terms apply.
enumDescriptions.SEL_Markup_Accepted: SEL markup intellectual property terms are accepted.
enumDescriptions.Other: Other non-standard intellectual property terms are specified.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Intellectual property provisions are not addressed in the contract.

insurance.description: Insurance requirements and coverage specifications mandated by the contract.

enumDescriptions.Standard: Standard insurance requirements as per company policy.
enumDescriptions.Non_Standard: Non-standard insurance requirements specific to this contract.
enumDescriptions.Other: Other specialized insurance arrangements are specified.

termination.description: Contract termination clauses and conditions for ending the agreement.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Termination clauses are included with specific conditions.
enumDescriptions.No: No termination clauses are included in the contract.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Termination provisions are not addressed in the contract.

federal_requirements.description: Federal regulatory requirements and compliance obligations specified in the contract.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Federal requirements and compliance obligations are included.
enumDescriptions.No: No federal requirements are applicable to this contract.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Federal requirements are not addressed in the contract terms.

ability_to_assign_contract.description: Provisions regarding the ability to assign or transfer contract rights and obligations.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Contract assignment is permitted under specified conditions.
enumDescriptions.No: Contract assignment is prohibited or restricted.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Contract assignment provisions are not addressed in the terms.

labor_escalation.description: Provisions for labor cost escalation adjustments during the contract period.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Labor escalation provisions are included for cost adjustments.
enumDescriptions.No: No labor escalation provisions are included.
enumDescriptions.NA: Labor escalation is not applicable to this type of contract.

prevailing_wages.description: Requirements for prevailing wage compliance as mandated by applicable laws.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Prevailing wage requirements apply and must be followed.
enumDescriptions.No: Prevailing wage requirements do not apply to this contract.
enumDescriptions.NA: Prevailing wages are not applicable to this type of work.

bill_rates_included.description: Whether specific billing rates are included and detailed in the contract.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Specific billing rates are included and detailed in the contract.
enumDescriptions.No: Billing rates are not specified or included in the contract.

additional_invoice_instructions.description: Additional requirements and instructions for invoice processing and submission.

enumDescriptions.Supporting_Documentation: Supporting documentation must be provided with invoices.
enumDescriptions.Submittal_Requirements: Specific submittal requirements must be met for invoicing.
enumDescriptions.Retainage: Retainage provisions apply to invoice processing.
enumDescriptions.Portal: Invoices must be submitted through a specific portal system.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: No additional invoice instructions are specified.

nda.description: Non-disclosure agreement provisions and confidentiality requirements.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Non-disclosure agreement provisions are included in the contract.
enumDescriptions.No: No non-disclosure agreement provisions are included.

site_requirements.description: Specific site access and personnel requirements for work performance.

enumDescriptions.Background_Check: Background checks are required for site access.
enumDescriptions.Drug_Testing: Drug testing is required for personnel working on site.
enumDescriptions.CyberSecurity_Requirements: Specific cybersecurity requirements must be met.
enumDescriptions.Safety_Training: Safety training is mandatory for site personnel.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: No specific site requirements are included in the terms.

change_order_process.description: Defined process and procedures for handling contract changes and modifications.

enumDescriptions.Yes: A defined change order process is included in the contract.
enumDescriptions.No: No change order process is specified in the contract.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Change order processes are not addressed in the contract terms.

shipping_terms.description: Shipping and delivery terms, responsibilities, and requirements specified in the contract.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Standard shipping terms are included in the contract.
enumDescriptions.No: No specific shipping terms are included.
enumDescriptions.Specific_Requirements: Specific shipping requirements are detailed in the contract.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Shipping terms are not addressed in the contract.

deliverable_requirements.description: Specific requirements and specifications for contract deliverables and outcomes.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Specific deliverable requirements are detailed in the contract.
enumDescriptions.No: No specific deliverable requirements are specified.
enumDescriptions.Not_Included_In_Terms: Deliverable requirements are not addressed in the contract terms.

small_business_reporting_requirements.description: Requirements for small business participation reporting and compliance.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Small business reporting requirements are included and must be followed.
enumDescriptions.No: No small business reporting requirements are specified.
enumDescriptions.NA: Small business reporting requirements are not applicable to this contract.

licensing.description: Professional licensing requirements and compliance obligations for contract performance.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Specific licensing requirements are mandated for contract performance.
enumDescriptions.No: No licensing requirements are specified in the contract.
enumDescriptions.NA: Licensing requirements are not applicable to this type of work.

suspension.description: Contract suspension clauses and conditions for temporary work stoppage.

enumDescriptions.Yes: Contract suspension provisions are included with specific conditions.
enumDescriptions.No: No contract suspension provisions are included.
enumDescriptions.NA: Contract suspension is not applicable to this type of agreement.

effective_date.description: The official start date when the contract terms become legally binding and enforceable.

expiration_date.description: The official end date when the contract terms expire and are no longer binding.
